column4: For example ssh -CX the.ip.address.here and then you can type like, nautilus, and that will forward the GUI stuff from nautilus through ssh
I did not know that.. gtk thanks.

Yea, I didn't know about it for a while either, but there's only been like one or two situations where I found it was actually that useful. Once you get handy with Linux the command like pretty much can do everything you need.
ya I dont mind the shell
